title: (x) FIATC MF Seguros logo - Futura, Gill Sans {Richard}
content:
I would like to id these fonts on the logo, please somebody can help me.   
   
thank you   
   
   
 [http://www.fiatc.es/internet/home.nsf/fHomeWeb?ReadForm&lang=0](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421031501/http:/www.fiatc.es/internet/home.nsf/fHomeWeb?ReadForm&lang=0)

 [‹ (x) Cabinets * Interior/Exterior/Repaints/Remodels - Centaur {JMC}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421031501/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10025 "Go to previous forum topic") [(c) retro geometric The Boutique logo - ITC Bauhaus (customized) {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421031501/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10018 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content:
There is a lot of Gill used, so it may have been based on that.   
   
It looks more like a slanted [normal](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421031501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gill-sans/bold/testdrive.html?s=FIATC&p=60) than a true [italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421031501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gill-sans/bold/testdrive.html?s=FIATC&p=60) to me.   
   
The M seems to be based on [Futura Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421031501/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/futura-black-sb/regular/testdrive.html?s=M&p=72) with an F drawn to suit.   
   
There looks to be a vectorised version of the logo in a PDF file   
 [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421031501/http:/www.fiatc.es/internet/ges001.nsf/6bdb3b15e850b696c125697e003f8dc4/acd3f1a3ce759227c1256cec0042ab61/%24FILE/info_20.pdf)
\<font class="dontLookLikeCrap"\>Seguros is Gill Sans and Fiatc is a skewed emboldened weight of Futura with added stencil effects\</font\> oops late again
